# Alert Panel Return Values

**API Collection**

These constants define values returned by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRunAlertPanel] function and by the `NSApplication` method [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/runModalSession(_:)] when the modal session is run with an `NSPanel` provided by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSGetAlertPanel] function.

## Constants

- **NSAlertDefaultReturn**: The user pressed the default button.
- **NSAlertAlternateReturn**: The user pressed the alternate button.
- **NSAlertOtherReturn**: The user pressed a second alternate button.
- **NSAlertErrorReturn**: The alert cannot identify the reason it was closed; it may have been closed by an external source or by a button other than those listed above.

## Constants

- **Modal Panel Return Values**: These constants define the possible return values for such methods as the `runModal...` methods of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOpenPanel] class, which tell which button (OK or Cancel) the user has clicked on an open panel.
- **Style Masks**: Constants that specify panel styles.
